name: Sorcery Blade
summary: Sorcery Blade is a science fiction fantasy RPG set on Mars in the year 3000 AD. In a world where the civilization of Earth collapsed due to the fall of a gigantic meteorite, the descendants (Carnelians) who emigrated to Mars got over the pioneering era, which was a departure from the primitive age, and soon the civilization level nears that of Earth. It will lead to an attempt to build a spaceship. While participating in the plan to build a spaceship to Earth, the protagonist Tia loses her fiancé by a terrorist organization and will throw herself into the battle to destroy her opponents.
